channel.title: Features on Puppet VSCode Extension
channel.description: Recent content in Features on Puppet VSCode Extension

item.title: Code Navigation
item.description: Outline View The new Outline View shows the symbol tree of the currently selected Puppet manifest. Supported symbols: Class Defined Type Attribute Variable More symbols are planned to be added. Note: Puppet 4 is not supported for symbols Breadcrumbs When the breadcrumbs.enabled setting is set to true, both the file path and the symbol tree hierarchy are shown in the Breadcrumb view. Note: Puppet 4 is not supported for symbols

item.title: Intellisense
item.description: Intellisense Live Workspace Intellisense If you are editing a module, or a Control Repository, you will now get live intellisense of the Puppet Custom Types, Functions, Classes and Defined Types. For example if you are editing the puppetlabs-apache module you will be able to get auto-complete for resources like apache::vhost or apache::mod::php. Note: Workspace Intellisense is only updated when you save a file, instead of features like linting which update as you type
